title: [Emberstone Hall, Terrace]
description: A half-wall of stone surrounds the open terrace and affords an expansive view of the island at day.  The bright sky blends in with the sparkling waters of the ocean that stretch off the coast.  The wavering image of the sun can be seen dancing on the waves.
room.location: Emberstone Hall, inside the frozen environs of the Pinefar Trading Post
